price: Wakasema: Bali sisi tumekuletea yale waliyo kuwa wakiyafanyia shaka.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ
footnotes: Wakasema: Usituogope, kwani hatukukujia kwa unalo liogopa, bali tumekujia kwa jambo la kukufurahisha, nalo ni kuwateremshia adhabu hawa watu wako walio kukadhibisha na wakawa wanaitilia shaka hiyo adhabu au wanaikanya.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
